==1. Prepare System and Install Dependencies ==


On your server you need to have installed : 
* Perl 5.8, 
* MySQL 5 or PostgreSQL 8.2.5, (in this guide PostgreeSQL 8.2.5 for compatibility reasons with other Bungheni software) 
* Zebra 2.0.22 or greater 
* a webserver - (in this guide Apache-Tomcat 6.0.18 for compatibility reasons with other Bungheni software)
